attributes.action: Ban all cars with less than 35mpg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should ban all cars with less than 35mpg. This will improve our country's emissions. It wouldn’t be feasible to stop the day it was announced, but the ban could start 5 years after the announcement, giving people enough time to adapt(buy a new car/improve their car) to this ban.
